title: Aerial wiring and catenary systems
fullText:
For aerial wiring and catenary systems, it shall be checked thatâ€”
(a) the overhead lines and their entry points into buildings have no evidence of the following:
(i) Insulation deterioration.
(ii) Deterioration of anchorages.
(iii) Deterioration of line-connection boxes; and
(b) the safety distance clearances have not been compromised by the introduction of, or modification to, any structures, vegetation or by raising of the ground level under overhead lines.
